scripts.install:python:lin: python3 -m venv venv && venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:python:win: python -m venv venv && venv\Scripts\pip.exe install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:python: node -e "process.exit(require('os').platform()==='win32'?0:1)" && npm run install:python:win || npm run install:python:lin
scripts.api:win: cd Backend/src && set PYTHONUTF8=1 && ..\..\venv\Scripts\python.exe -m flask --app app run --no-debugger
scripts.dev:lin: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail false "npm run api" "npm run web"
scripts.dev:win: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail false "npm run api:win" "npm run web"
scripts.dev:all: npm run install:python && npm run db && (node -e "process.exit(require('os').platform()==='win32'?0:1)" && npm run dev:win || npm run dev:lin)
